attributes.action: Stop companies (including the council) offering part time jobs of only 15 hours (2 days), therefore preventing applicants getting working tax credit
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Focussing on single parents, you have to be working 16+ hours to be entitled to working tax credit, hence being entitled to paid child care.  So WHY are companies offering part time work at 15 hours??????  Especially all the council jobs - which has to stop if the government want us single parents to get back to work
